## a.id() function

A unique identifier scalar type. This scalar is serialized like a String but isn't meant to be human-readable. If not specified on create operations, a ULID will be auto-generated service-side.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function id(): _Internal_ModelField<_Internal_Nullable<string>>;
```
**Returns:**

[\_Internal\_ModelField](./data-schema._internal_modelfield.md)<!-- -->&lt;[\_Internal\_Nullable](./data-schema._internal_nullable.md)<!-- -->&lt;string&gt;&gt;
